title: Learning Design Based on Investigating Mass and Volume of Matter

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental physical quantities (mass, volume) and experience using simple measurement tools
context.additional_context: Pre-service teacher training program for undergraduate elementary education majors, considering time constraints of working adult learners

learning_goals: Cultivation of the ability to design experiments for accurately measuring the mass and volume of substances.
Development of the ability to systematically apply the scientific inquiry process (question-hypothesis-experiment-analysis-conclusion).
Enhancement of the ability to convert measurement data into visual representations (graphs/tables) and interpret them.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
